short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds the transcript to any Wistia video on a webpage, if it has one.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily find and copy the transcript of any Wistia video!

Supports multiple videos on one page. These are not captions, it's just the transcript which has been written by the uploader of the video.

If you found a site where this extension isn't working, please check the following:
- Is the video you're trying to find the transcript of a Wistia video? Wistia videos usually allow you to right-click them and have an option 'About Wistia'.
- If you're more technical, try to find the transcript yourself by:
1. Inspect the webpage (Inspect Element)
2. Press Ctrl + F and type "transcript", then press Enter
3. Among the search results there should be a script element that embeds the video. The JSON of the script element should have a "transcript" key if there is one for that video.
